parameters.name: Attribute
parameters.description: Bend note attribute as defined in swBendNoteAttribute_e

title: IView.GetBendNoteAttributeString
description: Gets the internal string that is used to format the text of the specified bend note attribute in this drawing view of a sheet metal part.

parameters.name: Attribute
parameters.description: Bend note attribute as defined in swBendNoteAttribute_e

returns: String that is used to format the bend note attribute
remarks:
Call this method to specify the Format parameter of
IView::SetBendNoteTextFormat
.
